Coldfusion Express Free Beta Program

27 May 1999

The good folks at Allaire have opened a beta test to all HomeSite customers for the new free version of ColdFusion Server, called ColdFusion Express. It's basically a limited-functionality version of the full-blown server. Sure, it's free, but you gotta be a HomeSite customer.
